author: jamar
title: Platform for philosophers AIs
description: 那些伟大的哲学家和思想家对今天周围发生的事情会怎么说（如果他们还活着的话）？

f6_assessments.q0: This is not a serious proposal. It is asking for $100k, and has no plan of deliverables.
f6_assessments.q1: There is no plan and the experience is just the proposer making a joke.
f6_assessments.q2: There are no deliverables or milestones so there is not anything which can be measured.

f6_assessments.q0: This is a cool idea as it holds a potential to not only use the platform for fun, but also for educational purposes. Later on when the AI matures through learning, it could generate quotes that could have been said by ancient philosophers if they were to walk among the living today. However, there is no reference explaining how this could benefit the Cardano Blockchain ecosystem. So adding this information could improve the proposal idea.
f6_assessments.q1: The only information to determine the feasibility in this proposal is the claim of programming a chatbot, which does not justify a funding demand totalling one fifth of the challenge fund. To improve this, there needs to be a lot more information added that proves that the proposer is up for the task or has taken steps to find the right people to help him develop the idea presented.
f6_assessments.q2: This proposal has no auditability at all. So eventhough the idea is a good one, it can't receive a high score on presented information. It needs at least a decent plan, justification for the requested funding, broken down in a roadmap that contains a plan of operations and a definition of when this platform could be called a success (how many users, KPI).

f6_assessments.q0:
61 words asking for $100k to create a chat platform with a conversational AI based on philosophers writing.
There is no other useful data. This is just an idea with no real exploration of the requirement to make it real.
f6_assessments.q1: The experience given is not convincing. More would be required for a full proposal. (more details, professional profile, existing projects, etc...)
f6_assessments.q2: As this is just a 61 words concept there is not enough information available.

f6_assessments.q0: There are few research lines which has little visibility for producing practically usable outputs. This does not mean that these research lines are bad, but just that alloting money to such research is generally not preferred, particularly when the community is trying to stand on its feet.
f6_assessments.q1: THe proposer has not provided Leeds for enabling meaningful estimation of his expertise and experience in the proposed area. There is no implementation plan too.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal is just an idea presented to the community and the proposal has not included any plan for implementing or carrying out the research which is proposed.

f6_assessments.q0: This looks promising, creating an AI-based platform where you could talk to Plato of Socrates would amuse many minds. The problem I'm seeing is that there is not a lot of data about great philosophers that are worded in their own words. A lot of work today is reworks or stories heard of as far as I know.
f6_assessments.q1: Concerning Feasibility, we don't get a lot of information. The plan has not been submitted so we can't say much about the roadmap or budget requested. The only thing we have is the relevant experience the proposer has. Which was creating a chatbot that gave answers from a philosopher. It would've been great to see a reference on this. But for the scope of this proposal, the proposer would have to be a great philosopher himself to correctly interpret the manifestos of the ancient philosophers, since he is not explaining he needs funding for great philosophers.
f6_assessments.q2: We have no means to assess this proposal on its progress. We need a roadmap of the workflow so we know what the proposer plans on doing. How is the budget being spent? We can't just give the proposer $100.000  without knowing what he plans to do.

f6_assessments.q0: The idea of a philosopher chatbot seems like something that SingularityNet might like, but the proposal does not offer any information on how this would be accomplished. Accordingly, I disagree that the proposal effectively addresses the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1: The very brief description of how the proposer disclosed philosophical wisdom through a chatbot does not provide any basis to believe that it is highly likely that this proposal would be delivered. This is an exceptionally complicated problem that the best minds in AI have not solved. Much more would be needed to allocate $100K to this idea.
f6_assessments.q2: There are no stated deliverables or metrics for auditing the proposal other than a bare description of the proposed solution.

f6_assessments.q0: I really love the concept being proposed here and feel that it has great potential to make a significant impact for the AI and Cardano community. The proposal appears to be very much in the development stage however and has not clearly indicated how it will proceed. The community has shown their interest and I do hope the proposer continues to collaborate to further refine the way forward.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer certainly appears to have an understanding of what they would like to achieve but overall the proposal lacks the detail for us to know whether this could be implemented successfully. Further information regarding experience and a plan that shows the roadmap has not been provided. I do hope that this proposal is further expanded and resubmitted in later funding rounds.
f6_assessments.q2: Unfortunately, there simply is not enough information provided for the community to audit the progress or success of this proposal. Great idea and plenty of interest shown by the community but proposal needs further development, collaboration and detailed budget to to auditable. The budget request is not in line with the information provided to allow for a incubation concept to be realised.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal contributes to the educational purpose of the platform. An idea to improve the proposal is to indicate how this proposal could help the Cardano Blockchain ecosystem to grow.
f6_assessments.q1: Can the proposer prove or demonstrate some more about himself? Is he capable of doing this all by himself or is he planning to get people on board with the right expertise? The budget requested is big (if it's only for the chatbot) and is not split up, so it is not clear to me what he will use the money for, besides programming a chatbot.
f6_assessments.q2: I can only find little aspects from which it is possible to check the proposal. You still need a clear roadmap and you can invest even more in the elaboration of the financing. KPIs that measure whether this project is successful; e.g. how many users,…

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal focuses on creating a platform where people can program conversational AI based on the writings of great thinkers, making this wisdom accessible to all. Because this proposal is not completed [since there is no roadmap, KPIs/metrics, and budget breakdown,...], the solution is still very abstract, not a clear impact on the Cardano ecosystem as a whole. Based on the given information, I strongly disagree with this proposal's impact, and would give it a score of 1.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer's profile is not described clearly without any proof/external link for verification. Besides, a detailed plan is not provided, therefore, there is no proof of feasibility. Based on the given information, I strongly disagree with this proposal's feasibility, and would give it a score of 1.
f6_assessments.q2: This is an incomplete proposal [since there is no roadmap, KPIs/metrics, and budget breakdown,...] where auditability/transparency can't be guaranteed. Therefore, based on the given information, I strongly disagree with this proposal's auditability, and would give it a score of 1.

f6_assessments.q0: The relevance of this proposal is the application of AI technology. The author wants to form a philosophical foundation based on AI developers which are quite interesting, nowadays writing poetry, writing prose, or writing music AI can help with this. In this case, I would like to propose to clarify the impact or value system of the current proposal, which is vague and unclear.
f6_assessments.q1:
Please tell us your ability to implement this project what I found in the proposal is very little information.
Apart from the fact that he went to Chatbot to answer philosophical questions, he did not see a specific technical solution. Meanwhile, you also need to specify which AI system to use in your "Platform for philosophers AIs" project?
f6_assessments.q2: It can be difficult to ascertain the costs of your audit. At $100K it's relatively large compared to more complete proposals, which wouldn't be fair to them. I am always on the lookout for complete proposals and budgets to be worked out on project specifics. In your case please improve the proposal to get our support, thank you.

f6_assessments.q0:
The solution of the problem is related to SIngularity, AI but not really clear, more clearly about AI and the great philosophers and thinkers today

Setting up a platform is not easy, but the description of the solution is not really clear how and how.
f6_assessments.q1:
Regarding the team involved in the project, there is no relevant information, knowledge only stops at the answers via chatbox, which is different from building a platform. Need to add a description of yourself, the project team, the associated profile links via LinkIN, Tweeter,....
It is necessary to have a specific roadmap clearly stating the work items and the roadmap for the implementation plan
There should be KPIs to measure work progress
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposed funding amount of $ 100000 is not really consistent with the content offered
In addition, if the proposed amount is low, it is necessary to provide a plan to explain the budget and how to spend it so that the community can know.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposer suggests a platform for people to program conversational AI based on the writings of great thinkers and making that more accessible to people. Beyond this high level description no details are provided in how that would work and how it may be developed. The proposer also doesn't indicate how this may benefit the ecosystem in anyway. Without further information on the details of how this will be implemented or function it is impossible to gage the impact of this proposal even if the outline of idea has merit.
f6_assessments.q1: No team information is given and no budget break down. The budget represents a large amount of the funding available yet no justification is given. No confidence can be given as the proposal lacks the basic information.
f6_assessments.q2: No KPI or success metrics are provided, further information must be added to understand this proposal from a clarity perspective and whether it can be audited.

f6_assessments.q0: The idea certainly fits the challenge, but the lack of detail or information hobbles this proposal badly.
f6_assessments.q1: Nothing substantive is offered here. And it's sad, because the idea appears to have generated curiosity from the community, judging from the comments. More detail about the proposer, the idea, or even just a link to the mentioned chatbot would have improved this proposal enormously.
f6_assessments.q2: No information whatsoever is provided for the auditing of this proposal.

solution: 创建一个平台，人们可以根据伟大的思想家的著作对对话式人工智能进行编程，使所有人都能获得这种智慧。
experience: 我披露了我最喜欢的哲学家之一的智慧，并通过一个聊天机器人，用它来给出有趣的答案。
